alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:24PM CDT until June 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL FOARD...NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND SOUTHEASTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 923 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Odell to 3 miles south of Chillicothe to 4 miles northeast of Margaret, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. The greatest hail threat exists near Chillicothe and Medicine Mound. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chillicothe, Margaret, Fargo, Medicine Mound, Odell, Rayland, and Copper Breaks State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
